Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17151121]west nile virus(WNV):inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(P1 significantly inhibited WNV infectivity at a concentration of 1 mM,IC50=67.0 ± 0.1 μM);Dengue virus serotype 2:inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(99.3±0.7% inhibition at 200 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.17151121]No cytotoxicity against Vero cells up to 500μM.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Antiviral peptides targeting the west nile virus envelope protein.
Literature.Author: Bai F, Town T, Pradhan D, Cox J, Ashish, Ledizet M, Anderson JF, Flavell RA, Krueger JK, Koski RA, Fikrig E.
